label: 貫文
対訳語: (1) a unit of coinage； (2) a unit of weight　approximately equal to 3.75 kilograms
本: Alms and Vagabonds: Buddhist Temples and Popular Patronage in Medieval Japan . University of Hawai'i Press . 1994
説明文: (1)　(coinage) In 1150 a piece of residential land of unspecified area in Yamato province was sold for twentyseven kanmon (Mori 1973:27).
